lines.text:
[jumping on Lt. Barret]
Candy wanted to surprise you.
What do you think of Holt?
He's not as bad as I thought, but he's not as good as he thinks he is. I'll probably be working for him in five years.

[hears her on the guitar]
You're good.
Thank you, I'm better on the piano but of course when your parents are Norweigan and German, music has to be in the house.

[to Holt about staying with Roxane]
You eat with her, you drive with her, you take a bath with her if necessary.
What did Harris mean when he said Sands could be in the same room and we wouldn't be able to see him?
